column5: I recently raffled off a donation custom Sage Rod Build with all the proceeds going to the LHFC Trout hatchery. 	I was very proud of the work on this build and it raised $2,150.00 for the rearing of Steelhead to eventually be stocked into the Saugeen River.  	A few pictures of the build.
That is mighty fine work sir!
beautiful workmanship, and great cause, Whoever won that has a piece of artistry
Very nice, that is quality cork, don't see it that nice very often any more.?
Nice looking build for a good cause! Â I have an affinity for that blank!
